title: Nice tool for viewing/testing type
content:
This is something I just heard about;  
if it's old hat, mea culpa.

[http://typetester.maratz.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021055546/http:/typetester.maratz.com/ "http://typetester.maratz.com")

If not, enjoy.  
SDK  
Susan Kirkland  
author of  
Start and Run a Creative Services Business  
View my accumulated work and excerpts  
from the book (click on the book icon)  
 [www.sdkirkland.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021055546/http:/www.sdkirkland.com/ "www.sdkirkland.com")
author: skirklan
